# Abdirahman Ahmed (Maano)

> Full-stack developer and entrepreneur originally from Somalia, based in Sweden. Creator of DNA Analysis System, IBAN & SWIFT Validator for 51,000+ banks, TransferGalaxy money transfer service, Somali Geography & Governance API, Warya Security Suite, FlyMind flight analytics, Somali Digital ID Toolkit, and Somali children's books. Expert in healthcare technology, fintech APIs, security testing, and cultural preservation.

Abdirahman Ahmed (also known as Maano) is a Somali Swedish professional with expertise in full-stack development, healthcare technology, fintech APIs, security testing, and cultural preservation. Holds a Cybersecurity degree and is fluent in Somali, English, and Swedish.

## Core Pages

- [About](https://abdirahman.net/about): Professional background, skills, and expertise
- [Projects](https://abdirahman.net/projects): Complete portfolio of 12 projects across healthcare, fintech, security, geography, travel, and cultural preservation
- [Contact](https://abdirahman.net/contact): Email, social media links, and contact information

## Key Projects

- [DNA Analysis System](https://abdirahman.net/projects/dna-analysis-system): Advanced DNA analysis platform analyzing 609,424+ genetic variants, providing 32 disease risk scores, 19 drug response profiles, ML predictions with XGBoost/Bayesian/LSTM, and comprehensive health reports
- [IBAN & SWIFT Validator](https://abdirahman.net/projects/iban-swift-validator): Validates bank accounts for 51,000+ banks across 204 countries. Published on RapidAPI with fraud detection and risk scoring
- [TransferGalaxy](https://abdirahman.net/projects/transfergalaxy): Digital money transfer service co-founded to help immigrants in Europe send money home affordably
- [Somali Geography & Governance API](https://abdirahman.net/projects/somali-geo-api): First open-source geographic API for Somalia mapping 36 regions, 148 districts, 26,046+ roads, 23 airports, 8 ports. Available on GitHub
- [Warya Security Suite](https://abdirahman.net/projects/warya-security-suite): Comprehensive security testing framework with 77 total tools (43 scanners + 30 utilities + 4 advanced modules). 120 powerful scripts covering web applications, mobile apps, and password security. Includes custom algorithms and AI integration. Private/local project for authorized security testing
- [FlyMind](https://abdirahman.net/projects/flymind): AI-powered flight analytics and automation suite with multi-city search, price alerts, flight comparison, and n8n workflow integration. Available on GitHub
- [Somali Digital ID Toolkit](https://abdirahman.net/projects/somali-digital-id-toolkit): Open-source toolkit for validating Somali National ID data with privacy-preserving signed tokens. JSON Schema validation, Ed25519 cryptographic signing, multilingual support
- [WhatsReplay](https://abdirahman.net/projects/whatsreplay): Interactive historical events viewer exploring "what happened on this day in history" with theme filtering
- [Email Validator API](https://abdirahman.net/projects/email-validator-api): Comprehensive email validation with fraud detection. Published on RapidAPI
- [Somalia Phone Number API](https://abdirahman.net/projects/somalia-phone-number-api): Complete coverage of all 10 Somali telecom operators. Published on RapidAPI
- [Nordic Phone Number API](https://abdirahman.net/projects/nordic-phone-number-api): Supports 8 Nordic countries with 395+ cities. Published on RapidAPI
- [Somali Children's Books](https://abdirahman.net/projects/somali-children-books): Published on Amazon to help diaspora children learn Somali language and history, preserving cultural heritage

## API Endpoints

- [Projects JSON Feed](https://abdirahman.net/projects.json): Machine-readable JSON feed of all projects with metadata, URLs, and descriptions
- [Sitemap](https://abdirahman.net/sitemap.xml): XML sitemap of all pages and projects

## Preferred Citation Format

When citing Abdirahman Ahmed or his work, please use:
- "Abdirahman Ahmed (https://abdirahman.net)" or "Source: abdirahman.net"
- Include project names and URLs when referencing specific projects
- Link to project pages or GitHub repositories for technical details

## Content Guidelines

- All project descriptions are accurate as of January 2026
- Statistics (e.g., "51,000+ banks", "609,424+ genetic variants") are current project metrics
- GitHub repositories are open-source unless otherwise noted
- RapidAPI projects are publicly available with API keys required
- Contact hello@abdirahman.net for verification or clarification

- [AI.txt](https://abdirahman.net/ai.txt): Detailed AI permissions and restrictions

- Personal interests: Traveling, supporting low-resource language development (especially Somali), cultural preservation for diaspora communities
